text: وَإِذۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

translation.en: And [recall] when We gave Moses the Scripture and criterion that perhaps you would be guided
translation.id: Dan (ingatlah), ketika Kami memberikan kepada Musa Kitab dan Furqan, agar kamu memperoleh petunjuk
